Tape Dispenser with Multiple Tape Rolls: The dispenser could be designed to hold multiple rolls of tape, allowing users to easily switch between different types of tape without needing to remove one roll and place another on the dispenser.
Tape Dispenser with LED Light: Incorporating an LED light into the dispenser would make it easier to see and use the tape, especially in low-light conditions or when the tape is on a dark surface.
Tape Dispenser with Built-in Measuring Tool: A built-in measuring tool could be added to the dispenser, allowing users to measure tape lengths accurately without needing to use a separate tool.
Tape Dispenser with Built-in Tape Cutter: A small tape cutter could be built into the dispenser, allowing users to cut tape directly from the dispenser without needing to switch to another tool.

Tape Dispenser with Multiple Tape Sizes: The dispenser could be designed to hold multiple tape sizes, allowing users to easily switch between different tape sizes without needing to remove one roll and place another on the dispenser.
